text: The Calumet Montana Refining is an oil refinery located in Great Falls, Montana. The refinery is currently owned and operated by Calumet Specialty Products Partners, L.P. ==See also== *List of oil refineries ==References== ==External links== * Calument Specialty website Category:Energy infrastructure in Montana Category:Buildings and structures in Great Falls, Montana Category:Oil refineries in the United States
title: Calumet Montana Refining
